::: {#hero-heading}

Chi is a researcher at the Norwegian Institute of Public Health (Folkehelseinstituttet). She is a statistician and R programmer at [Sykdomspulsen](https://docs.sykdomspulsen.no), a real-time analysis and public health surveillance system.

Chi will start her positions as **lecturer in biostatistics** and **research software engineer** (RSE) at Oslo Centre for Biostatistics and Epidemiology ([OCBE](https://www.med.uio.no/imb/english/research/centres/ocbe/)) and University of Oslo in April 2023. She recently obtained her PhD at OCBE on hospital Electronic health records (EHR). 

Chi also has a 20% position as a statistical advisor at OCBE and Oslo University Hospital (OUS). 

Chi enjoys spending time in the mountains and being surrounded by farm animals.
:::
